prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with flowing tentacles and a vibrant color palette.
Show me an aquatic creature that has a mix of purple and pink hues.
Imagine a prehistoric Pokemon resembling a plant with a unique oval body.
Generate a creature that thrives in both wetlands and deep caves, with distinct features.
Design a Pokemon that has a round, bulbous shape and a whimsical appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a fusion of a plant and a rock creature.
Make a Pokemon that has multiple soft appendages and a mysterious aura.
